biotools.summary: SCope is a fast visualization tool for large-scale and high dimensional scRNA-seq datasets. Currently the data format supported by SCope is .loom. This file format for very large omics datasets is maintained by the Linnarsson Lab through the loompy Python package (https://github.com/linnarsson-lab/loompy).
